title: Sideboard and Wine Cabinet
artistDisplayName:
Designed by William Burges 
English, 1827–1881
Painted by Nathaniel Hubert John Westlake 
English, 1833–1921
Made by Harland & Fisher
London, England
medium: Pine and mahogany, painted and gilded; iron straps; and metal mounts
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by the James McClintock Snitzler Fund through the Antiquarian Society, Mrs. DeWitt W. Buchanan, Jr., Mr. and Mrs. Henry M.
